title: How to set up the Apple iPad Air 5 (2022)
content:
Apple revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance event. This tablet comes with optional 5G network support and is powered by the mighty M1 chip. The iPad Air 5 features the same exterior design as the previous-gen model. However, it’s available in new vivid colors that aren’t present on the 4th Gen

The post How to set up the Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has finally revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022). Here's how to go through the setup process of this new M1-powered tablet.
